query.name: page_no
query.description: Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Default to be 1 and allowed input is from 1 - 5000.

query.name: page_size
query.description: Use the 'page_size' filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). Default to be 20 and allowed input is from 1- 100.

query.name: status
query.description: The status filter for retrieving voucher list. Available value: upcoming/ongoing/expired/all.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking.

schema.name: response
schema.description: Detailed informations you are querying.

schema.name: more
schema.description: This is to indicate whether the comment list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve the rest of comments.

schema.name: voucher_list
schema.description: The list of voucher.

schema.name: voucher_id
schema.description: The unique identifier for a voucher.

schema.name: voucher_code
schema.description: Voucher Code

schema.name: voucher_name
schema.description: Voucher Name

schema.name: voucher_type
schema.description: The type of the voucher. The available values are: 1: shop voucher, 2: product voucher.

schema.name: reward_type
schema.description: The reward type of the voucher. The available values are: 1: fix_amount voucher, 2: discount_percentage voucher, 3: coin_cashback voucher.

schema.name: usage_quantity
schema.description: The number of times for this particular voucher could be used.

schema.name: current_usage
schema.description: Up till now, how many times has this particular voucher already been used.

schema.name: start_time
schema.description: The timing from when the voucher is valid; so buyer is allowed to claim and to use.

schema.name: end_time
schema.description: The timing until when the voucher is still valid. Any time after this end_time, buyer is not allowed to claim or to use.

schema.name: is_admin
schema.description: If the voucher is created by Shopee or not.

schema.name: voucher_purpose
schema.description: The use case for the voucher. The available values are: 0: normal; 1: welcome, 2: referral; 3: shop_follow; 4:shop_game, 5: free_gift, 6: membership

schema.name: discount_amount
schema.description: The discount amount set for this particular voucher. Only when it is a fix amount voucher, api will return a value.

schema.name: percentage
schema.description: The discount percentage set for this particular voucher. Only when it is a discount percentage voucher or coins cashback voucher, api will return a value.

schema.name: cmt_voucher_status
schema.description: The voucher status in CMT. The available values are: 1:review, 2: approved, 3:reject. Only when this voucher is attending CMT campaign and not being rejected, api will return a value.

schema.name: display_start_time
schema.description: The timing of when voucher is displayed on shop pages; so buyer is allowed to claim.

error_codes.message: There is no access_token in query.
There is no partner_id in query.
There is no sign in query.
Something is wrong. Please try later.
